repositories.name: BlockAccess
repositories.description: This PHP project detects the client's geolocation and VPN usage using the ip-api service and applies access control logic based on the detected data.

repositories.name: ClockX
repositories.description: A Web Wallpaper Clock that displays the current time in a beautiful way. It is a simple and elegant clock that can be used as a wallpaper on your desktop.

repositories.name: CountdownX
repositories.description: CountdownX is a simple and adorable countdown timer webpage. It allows you to set a countdown timer in a cute way using HTML.

repositories.name: ImgCrypt
